statements: DELETE FROM car_warranty_info WHERE manufacturer_id = 1 AND expiration_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM car_warranty_info WHERE manufacturer_name LIKE 'Toyota%' AND warranty_duration > 3;
DELETE FROM car_warranty_info WHERE warranty_duration = 2 OR expiration_date < '2022-06-01';
DELETE FROM Cars WHERE production_year < 2010 AND manufacturer_id = 2;
DELETE FROM CarManufacturers WHERE warranty_length > 3 AND expiration_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Cars c USING CarManufacturers cm WHERE c.manufacturer_id = cm.id AND cm.manufacturer_name = 'Toyota';
DELETE FROM CarModels WHERE production_year < 2015 AND warranty_years = 2;
DELETE FROM warranties WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE
DELETE FROM warranty_issues WHERE issue_description ILIKE '%defective%'
